definition: A relative afar is less use than a close neighbor (idiom). Take whatever help is on hand, even from strangers.
pinyin: yuan3 qin1 bu4 ru2 jin4 lin2

sentences.english: Like the pulsing life of the neighbourhood, like buds, determined to bloom, like the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 就像那至高無上的生命的近鄰，像蓓蕾取決於綻放。

sentences.english: An old saying goes that a near neighbor is better than a distant cousin. Having a good neighbor is lucky.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說“遠親不如近鄰”，有個好鄰居是件幸運的事。

sentences.english: Australia's close little neighbors will remain a headache for Canberra.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞的小近鄰將仍然是堪培拉的頭痛問題。

sentences.english: The bigger value of next-nearest hopping and larger size of nanoribbons mean more marked such effect.
sentences.chinese: 次近鄰躍遷和納米帶的尺寸越大，這種影響越顯著。

sentences.english: It also studies the spread and variation of these illustrations in China and the neighboring country Japan.
sentences.chinese: 並探討山海經圖在國內與近鄰日本國的流傳與變異。

sentences.english: Poland forged an alliance with its neighbour Lithuania.
sentences.chinese: 波蘭和它的近鄰立陶宛結成同盟。

sentences.english: China and Japan are close neighbours separated only by a strip of water.
sentences.chinese: 中國和日本是一衣帶水的近鄰。

sentences.english: Worries about predations from the nearby giant are understandable.
sentences.chinese: 擔心近鄰大公司的掠奪，是可以理解的。

sentences.english: But the external perception of a city being left behind by its nearest rival remains.
sentences.chinese: 但是外界對它落後於近鄰死敵的觀念依然存在。

sentences.english: An old saying goes that a near neighbor is better than a distant cousin.
sentences.chinese: 俗話說“遠親不如近鄰”，有個好鄰居是件幸運的事。

sentences.english: K-NN is a method of classifying based on statistics.
sentences.chinese: 近鄰是基於統計的分類方法。

sentences.english: You are close neighbours in health, and you are good neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 你們在衛生方面是近鄰，而且是睦鄰。

sentences.english: So, the growth of aggregate is greatly affected by the probability of growth and the neighbor condition.
sentences.chinese: 即生長概率和近鄰條件對凝聚體的生長有顯著的影響。

sentences.english: He noted that Thailand and China are both close neighbors and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，泰中既是近鄰又是親戚。

sentences.english: K nearest neighbor queries is essential for location-based position.
sentences.chinese: 近鄰查詢是位置服務的一個重要功能。

sentences.english: Wu said that China and Cambodia are close neighbors enjoying an over-2000-year history of friendly exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 吳邦國說，中柬是近鄰，有兩千多年的友好交往歷史。

definition: Chinese person who returns to China after living as an expatriate
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
student of a senior high school
Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Fuhsing township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: (separated only by) a narrow strip of water
